transform.script: try { if (ctx._source.containsKey('decimalLatitude') && ctx._source.containsKey('decimalLongitude') && ctx._source['decimalLatitude'].toDouble() <= 90 && ctx._source['decimalLatitude'].toDouble() >= -90 && ctx._source['decimalLongitude'].toDouble() <= 180 && ctx._source['decimalLongitude'].toDouble() >= -180) { ctx._source['latlon'] = [ctx._source['decimalLongitude'].toDouble(), ctx._source['decimalLatitude'].toDouble()];}}catch (Exception e) {ctx._source['latlon'] = null;}
